tags: MY SISTER AND I WERE HAVING A DISCUSSION ON THIS AKJSNKJFD
or at least crappy sci fi nerds askjnfg
summary: Tony, a nerd: Okay Bruce, help me out. I need some design input on Nat’s suit. It’s gotta be functional yet fresh-- Bruce, also...
body:
Tony, a nerd: Okay Bruce, help me out. I need some design input on Nat’s suit. It’s gotta be functional yet fresh–

Bruce, also a nerd: Tron lines.

Tony: What?

Bruce: She needs Tron lines. Add Tron lines to her suit.

Tony:

Tony: My god you’re right

title: Homesick
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EZgbJy

by Twentysomethingloser92

“…But he was so much more than that to you, he was someone you could talk too. Someone who understood your struggles and listened without interrupting. He would laugh with you and hold you when you needed to cry.
You knew that he had a girlfriend, you had met her once. Sharon Carter was beautiful, she was friendly and also in the military.
There was always a sense of jealousy that would erupt from you whenever she was mentioned in your conversations, but who were you to be jealous.
In a few more years you would be married off to a King from some distant land where you wouldn’t marry for love, you would marry to unite the countries.
It would be a diplomatic marriage and it would break your heart.,”

Words: 1578, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Captain America - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/F, F/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Sharon Carter, Brock Rumlow, Alexander Pierce, Nick Fury, James “Bucky” Barnes, James “Rhodey” Rhodes
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/ Reader, Tony Stark/ Reader - Relationship, sharon Carter/ Steve Rogers, Tony Stark/ Pepper Potts, Natasha Romanoff/Sharon Carter
  • Additional Tags: Steve Rogers!Bodyguard, royal!reader, Arranged Marriage, Smut


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EZgbJy

title: Confessions
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NXHN4Y

by martianwahtney

During training Wanda digs a little too far into Steve’s mind and uncovers one horrifying secret about the Winter Soldier and Howard and Maria Stark. Unable to believe her Captain would keep such a secret she tells Tony Stark. Many nights later she and Tony have confessional with each other.

(T2- Confessions Under the Influence)

Words: 1591, Chapters: ½, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Tony Stark Bingo 2019

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Wanda Maximoff, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers
  • Relationships: Wanda Maximoff & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Tony Stark Has Issues, Tony Stark-centric, Wanda Maximoff Needs a Hug, Hurt Wanda Maximoff, Confessions, Wanda and Tony have quite the talk, Alcohol, Confessions Under the Influence, Tony is under the influence of coffee and no sleep, Wanda is under the influence of some vodka, Dialogue Heavy, they literally just confess their sins to each other nothing gets absolved

title: Confessions - Chapter 1 - martianwahtney - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
During training Wanda digs a little too far into Steve’s mind and uncovers one horrifying secret about the Winter Soldier and Howard and Maria Stark. Unable to believe her Captain would keep such a secret she tells Tony Stark. Many nights later she and Tony have confessional with each other.

(T2- Confessions Under the Influence)
@tonystarkbingo

blog.name: justincorrectmarvelquotes
blog.title: I Swear They Said it
blog.description: "Act up, you can get smashed up." -City Girls

summary: Peter fell asleep on the celing.
question: Peter fell asleep on the celing.
answer:
Oof short but here.

“Peter?” Tony called, stepping into the boys compound bedroom. It was nearly eleven o’clock and the boy had school tomorrow so Tony was on top of getting the kid to sleep. He knew how bad it was to concentrate on the wrong hours of sleep.

“Peter, let’s go, you’re 16 I don’t need to tell you to go to bed,” Tony announced, clasping his hands together as he looked around the room. 

He had been looking after Peter for many nights like these, ever since Peter was a true Avengers. May had appreciated the help a lot since she worked mostly during the day and hated leaving Peter alone a lot of the time. 

Tony and she soon become tag parents and helped each other out as much as they can. driving out to see decathlon tournaments, and helping with the getting ready portion of dances. Tony had to admit, he loved letting Peter borrow his cars to drive to get together’s with friends or to school and giving him lessons on repairing certain things. he felt like he was really there for someone. It felt good.

He sighed and gazed around the kid’s bedroom one more time before getting ready to leave when suddenly, he heard a loud yelp and a large thud close behind him.

He whipped around to see the spider boy, on the ground, wincing a bit.

“What the hell?” Tony said, helping Peter to feet his carefully. The boy’s eyes drooped slightly as he yawned.

I was testing to see how long I can stay on the ceiling for and I fell asleep.” He said, drowsily. Tony snickered, laughing at Peter’s behavior. “Cool, that’s a sign that you need to sleep in your bed.” He said, through a chuckle.

Peter nodded slowly and jumped onto his mattress.

summary: I Want To Fly (But I Don't Have The Wings) - wolfie_slays - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: I Want To Fly (But I Don't Have The Wings) - wolfie_slays - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark
Additional Tags: Wingfic, Alternate Universe - Wings, Friends to Lovers, Fluff, Hydra Took Bucky’s Wings, And Tony Gave Them Back, Tony Stark Has A Heart
Summary:

When Bucky fell from the train, HYDRA took his wings, his last tether to humanity. Years on, and back in Stark Tower, Tony Stark just wants to help fix things.
